programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep38
programme.desc: Scare Tactics / Disturbiahhh! - Grug has Thunk use "scare tactics" to get the Valley to defend against the Broods/Eep thinks Snoot is holding Ahhh! Valleyites captive in his cave

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep25
programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep15
programme.desc: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out - When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy moon, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep37
programme.desc: The Tooth Pirate / Zups - When Archibald loses his last baby tooth, he wants to hold onto it forever. But in a bizarre dream, the dastardly Tooth Pirate steals it and Archibald must set out on a high seas adventure to get it back. / Archibald and Sage go door-to-door selling specialty ketchups for a Rooster Ranger Fundraiser.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep50
programme.desc: Scare Bud / All Harvey's Eve - There's an uninvited guest at the Bow's house: a not-so-scary ghost named Casper. On Halloween, Lotta tries to win a spooky storytelling contest.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep50
programme.desc: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F - The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep45
programme.desc: Rupert and the Sleepy Flowers - RUPERT wants to play with RAGGETY. But Raggety has to work - MOTHER NATURE needs him to plant seedlings. Rupert decides to make Raggety's life easier, and discovers Ping Pong has some magic seeds for flowers that grow really easily, no watering or pruning required. Rupert and Raggety scatter these seeds across Nutwood, head off to have fun. But the flowers turn out to be Snoozeflowers: their perfume sends everyone to sleep. Rupert's plan for Raggety doing less work has backfired Nutwood is going to become a place where nothing's done at all, because everyone's sleeping. Luckily, it's revealed that rain will wash the snooze away, and Rupert takes Raggety up to the top of the lighthouse so he can make rainstorms, rescue Nutwood from sleepiness. They get down to gardening together!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep46
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magical Puppets - Rupert and his friends have fun making puppet versions of themselves. They are amazed when the puppets appear to come alive and run away, forcing the friends to pursue them all over Nutwood.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert and the Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert and the Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep45
programme.desc: How Can I Cheer Up Kevin? - JESS, and his friends are looking after Kevin the carp while Horace goes to visit a friend. They decide to clean out HORACE'S pond for him and take all the yukky pond weed to the river where the hungry fishes gobble it up. But when they get back they find that KEVIN is unhappy in his pond. How can I cheer up Kevin? That's the Big Question. First JESS thinks that KEVIN might be lonely so they take it in turns to keep him company. But KEVIN seems even more unhappy than before. Jess thinks that KEVIN is probably hungry. They saw the fish in the river eating weed so they go back to the river to get some for KEVIN. KEVIN gobbles up the weed, but he's soon looking sad again. JESS thinks that maybe staying in one place all the time is making KEVIN unhappy. So he gives him a little holiday in the river. KEVIN really perks up. A holiday seems to be the answer. Except that as soon as he's back in his pond KEVIN is miserable again. Horace comes back and explains to them s how pond weed helps fish to breathe, Jess r

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep46
programme.desc: How Can We Decorate The Christmas Tree? - It's Christmas Eve on Greendale Farm. Jess is very very excited. Every year Mimi decorates the special tree in the woods and the friends all gather around to sing and play and open presents. But when Jess, Mimi and Willow arrive to leave presents at the tree they're shocked to see that the wind has blown all the decorations away! How dreadful! - How will they celebrate Christmas with no decorations? And Mimi can't help as she and Willow have promised to deliver presents outside the farm. Jess promises to work it out How can we decorate the Christmas Tree?' that's the Big Question!. He searches the farm for decorations but cannot find them. Then he realises he's found some lovely natural things that they can use to MAKE decorations. Yippety Yay! Of course! So everyone pulls together and gathers fircones and teasels, straw and bulrushes. programme.desc: Guess Who's Shopping for Dinner? / New Roomie - Abuela teaches Ronnie Anne that getting ingredients for dinner is no small task. // When Vito's apartment floods, the kids try to find an apartment that suits him best.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Bo Bo Business / Blunder Party - Ronnie Anne and Sid are pumped up for their sleepover, but Carl and Adelaide might ruin the day! // After a disagreement with Abuelo, Bobby goes to work for Mr. Hong to try out his new business ideas.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Klopnodian Heritage Festival - The Star Family learns the cultural traditions of the old country.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep159
programme.desc: A SquarePants Family Vacation - When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Painting with Squidward / Kamp Kow - Counselor Squidward is determined for his cabin to win the annual camp art competition. // The Kamp Koral campers befriend a cute cow with a big appetite.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Helter Shelter / Reveille Revolution - SpongeBob, Sandy, and Patrick are split up into separate cabins. // Squidward has to earn back his morning 'Reveille' duties.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Road Trip: Bizarritorium - When Mom is assigned a travel article at work, she takes the entire family on a cross country road trip. But the trip gets off to a bumpy start when Lincoln tries to change Mom's itinerary to go to Dr. Weirdly's Bizarritorium.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Prime Time - Feeling helpless as Robby's condition worsens, Mo wishes she had never touched the Emberstone. Quintus Prime shows the young hero that because of her, the world is a better place.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Home Ecch! / Fun & Done! - Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep225
programme.desc: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse - SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation!

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Cleo in the Kitchen/The Case of the Missing Squeak - Cleo tries to make a home-cooked meal to raise Clawdeen's spirits and cure her homesickness. // Ghoulia helps Lagoona find her precious, secret toy, investigating all their classmates to find the culprit.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep128
programme.desc: Growth Spout / Stuck in the Wringer - Mr. Krabs tries to find enough food to feed Pearl as she goes through her growth spurt. // After showering, SpongeBob gets stuck in his wringer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep129
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy / The Inside Job - Plankton steals Sandy's fur to disguise himself as Sandy and get the Krabby Patty formula. // Plankton goes inside SpongeBob's head to get the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep130
programme.desc: Greasy Buffoons / Model Sponge - Mr. Krabs and Plankton woo customers with greasy entrees. // SpongeBob tries a career at being a model in a kitchen sponge commercial.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep131
programme.desc: Keep Bikini Bottom Beautiful / A Pal for Gary - Squidward cleans up the city of Bikini Bottom with "help" from SpongeBob. // SpongeBob brings Gary a pet that terrorizes him.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Drooling Fool / Patrick's Got An Alien Zoo Loose - Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Master and the Panda - When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually evil Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to powerful Peng that he is the one who skadooshed his uncle.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Blind Bandit - In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies. // The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: Planet Sheen S01 Ep112
programme.desc: To Chill A Mocking Blurg / Now You Sheen It - The Emperor's Royal Ball of Compliments turns into a Hall of Insults. // Sheen puts on a magic show that actually makes people disappear.

programme.title: Planet Sheen S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Desperate Houseguests / Nesvidanya - Sheen helps Doppy's parents rid their house of an unwanted guest. // Sheen has to rescue Nesmith from a mythical white-haired creature, the Boopenfoofer.

programme.title: Planet Sheen S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Sheen Says / Hippocratic Oaf - The Emperor leaves Sheen in charge of the kingdom when he goes out of town. // Sheen becomes a doctor and sets up a clinic in Zeenu.

programme.title: Landline Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Asha Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Sri Lanka's Blue Giant Guardian: A pile of floating whale poo launched Asha de Vos's career. As global shipping lanes around Sri Lanka get busier, she is on a mission to protect the blue whales that call these waters home.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep211
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep216
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a panel led by Julia Baird, Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep169
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Bridget McKenzie Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Over trout pasta, Nationals Senator Bridget McKenzie explains the loneliness that comes from being in the eye of a political scandal. She also instructs Annabel in the art of clay target shooting at a Wodonga rifle range.

programme.title: The World Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Q+A Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - The show that holds newsmakers and leaders to account. Q+A brings you lively debate and unpredictable moments as Patricia Karvelas puts your questions to the panel to get you answers on the issues that matter to Australians.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep231
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Clarry's nephew joins the team after finding trouble in his home town. When a bull catching vehicle is damaged on the Cooks muster, mechanic Kody tries to fix it. Kurt Hammar embarks on the biggest muster of the season.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Coastal Critters Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin heads along the rugged cliffs and sandy flats of the coast where he finds a master of the skies - the sea eagle, a master of disguise - the estuarine stone fish and the master of camouflage - the sting ray.

programme.title: The News

programme.title: The Debate

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Allen vs. Craig
programme.desc: Prelims - In a wide-open middleweight division, every fight is an important one, and on November 18, 185-pound contenders Brendan Allen and Paul Craig collide in a UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas that will set up a huge 2024 campaign for the winner. Winner of five straight with four finishes and a pair of Performance of the Night bonuses, Allen is surging at the perfect time for this fall matchup with Craig, the Scottish submission machine, who announced his arrival to the division in July with an impressive stoppage of Andre Muniz

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
